about_the_game:
Its thick fur glistening in the moonlight, the great wolf charges through the forest as a hunting party gives chase with torches lit and weapons drawn. Dodging an arrow, the wolf leaps over a fallen tree and tumbles into a wide clearing. With the soldiers now emerging from the darkness and closing in fast, the wolf bristles, stands on its hind legs and bears its teeth, ready to fight for its life. This is no ordinary canine...



These poor hunters are soon to learn that the forest is not their friend in the black of night. Will you brave the dangers of Silent Forest and be lucky enough to come out in one piece?

FEATURE LIST

  • New hero Gunther - a powerful Werewolf warrior who can turn its enemies into a gang of Werewolves!
  • Solve the mystery of the murder of Gunther's wife and rescue his daughter Angela!
  • Five new battles and skirmishes with hunters!
  • Four new battle music themes!
  • New enemies - Cyclopes and Nagas!
